column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack sees the bird fly into the kitchen.
column3: Jack will open the refrigerator to get a cold drink.
column4: Jack will throw away the spoiled food.

column1: Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden sees the bird land on the roof.
column3: Caden will call a man to fix the leak.
column4: Caden will go out and play.

column1: Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi sees the bird fly into the room.
column3: Vivi will lay the triangle toy on the shelf.
column4: Vivi will go to find another triangle toy.

column1: Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. A cat walks into Emma's room. Emma sees the cat walk into her room.
column3: Emma will start drawing on her bathrobe.
column4: Emma will dye the whole bathrobe yellow.
